Uses of Class
exceptions.InvalidFieldException

  • Packages that use InvalidFieldException 
    Package Description
    goGame  

    • Uses of InvalidFieldException in goGame

      Methods in goGame that throw InvalidFieldException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Board.reset()
      Empties all intersections of this board (i.e., let them refer to the value Stone.UNOCCUPIED).
      void Board.setField​(int row, int col, Stone color)
      Sets the content of the intersection represented by the (row,col) pair to the stone s.
      void Board.setField​(int i, Stone color)
      Sets the content of intersection i to the stone s.
      char Board.setField​(Board.Coordinate2D coordinate, Stone color)
      Sets the content of the intersection represented by the 2D coordinate to the stone s.
      Constructors in goGame that throw InvalidFieldException 
      Constructor Description
      Board​(int dimension)
      Creates an empty board.
